ing: 1 small jalapeno pepper, seeded and minced
salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "A fruity salsa, great with pita chips. One guy I know was gonna pay me to make this for him. I like to let mine sit for at least an hour and give it a stir every so often.  However, if you want to eat it right away."
ins: Stir the mango, tomato, onion, jalapeno pepper, cilantro, and lime juice together in a bowl; season with salt and pepper.
